analyzed: na u ce labhetha nipakam sahāya
ekaḥ care mātaṅga raññā iva nāgaḥ
ete a laddhā an avajja bhojī
ītī ca gaṇḍo ca upaddavo ca
rogo ca sallañca bhayañca mā ita
sītam ca uṇham ca khudam pipāsa
uppanna ñāṇaḥ umhi an añña neyyaḥ
khiḍḍam ratim kāma sukham ca loke
puttam ca dāram pitaram ca mātara
an añña posī sa padāna cārī
sīhaḥ iva saddesu a santa santaḥ
